title: Litumba
description: A centralized online platform for members of the Bakweri tribe in Cameroon to connect, share, and grow socially and economically.

title: Ndolo
description: An online dating platform for Cameroonians living abroad, designed to help them find partners who share their cultural morals and values.

title: MustardSeed Project Tracker
description: Construction project management tool enabling comprehensive management of projects, materials, finances, and equipment for MustardSeed Constructions teams.

title: Personal Website
description: Personal platform showcasing projects, skills, and professional capabilities.
